name: Honey Magician
description:
Have you ever been attracted to a sexy, mysterious beauty magician? This game will let you enjoy and participate in the beautiful magician's performance.

The player takes the role of a female magician in a variety of magic shows that test the player's reflexes, strategies, patience and more.

· 3D simulacreous picture, restoring the real magic scene.

· Level challenge mode, very challenging.

· Exquisite character modeling, magicians and beautiful assistants make people move.

· A variety of magic tricks.
